blogPost.excerpt:
Watch the Live Premiere Event for "Billie Eilish: The Worldâ€™s A Little Blurry", a new Apple Original Film, featuring a conversation with Zane Lowe and a special performance. Watch the film exclusively on Apple TV+. https://apple.co/theworldsalittleblurry

Apple TV+ is available on the Apple TV app including iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, iPod touch, Mac, select Samsung, LG, Sony and VIZIO smart TVs, Amazon Fire TV and Roku devices, Chromecast with Google TV, PlayStation and Xbox consoles, and at tv.apple.com. Just look for the Apple TV app and if you donâ€™t have it go the App Store on your device and download it. If youâ€™ve bought an Apple device like an iPhone, iPad or MacBook recently, you have Apple TV Plus included already.
 
The new Apple Original Film "Billie Eilish: The Worldâ€™s A Little Blurryâ€ tells the true coming-of-age story of the singer-songwriter and her rise to global superstardom. From award-winning filmmaker R.J. Cutler, the film offers a deeply intimate look at this extraordinary teenagerâ€™s journey, at just seventeen years old, navigating life on the road, on stage, and at home with her family, while writing, recording and releasing her debut album â€œWHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?â€ 
 
The documentary is from Apple Original Films, in association with Interscope Films, Darkroom, This Machine and Lighthouse Management & Media. Directed by R.J. Cutler and starring Billie Eilish, Finneas Oâ€™Connell, Maggie Baird, and Patrick Oâ€™Connell as themselves.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/billieeilishâ€‹

Shop â€œThe Worldâ€™s A Little Blurryâ€ collection: http://store.billieeilish.com  
 
Follow Apple TV: 
Instagram: https://instagram.com/AppleTVâ€‹ 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/AppleTVâ€‹

Giphy: https://giphy.com/AppleTVâ€‹ 
More from Apple TV: https://apple.co/32qgOEJâ€‹ 
Subscribe to Apple TVâ€™s YouTube channel: https://apple.co/AppleTVYouTubeâ€‹ 
 
Apple TV+ is a streaming service with original stories from the most creative minds in TV and film. Watch now on the Apple TV app: https://apple.co/_AppleTVappâ€‹

Watch the Live Premiere Event for "Billie Eilish: The Worldâ€™s A Little Blurry", a new Apple Original Film, featuring a conversation with Zane Lowe and a special performance. Watch the film exclusively on Apple TV+. https://apple.co/theworldsalittleblurry

Apple TV+ is available on the Apple TV app including iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, iPod touch, Mac, select Samsung, LG, Sony and VIZIO smart TVs, Amazon Fire TV and Roku devices, Chromecast with Google TV, PlayStation and Xbox consoles, and at tv.apple.com. Just look for the Apple TV app and if you donâ€™t have it go the App Store on your device and download it. If youâ€™ve bought an Apple device like an iPhone, iPad or MacBook recently, you have Apple TV Plus included already.
 
The new Apple Original Film "Billie Eilish: The Worldâ€™s A Little Blurryâ€ tells the true coming-of-age story of the singer-songwriter and her rise to global superstardom. From award-winning filmmaker R.J. Cutler, the film offers a deeply intimate look at this extraordinary teenagerâ€™s journey, at just seventeen years old, navigating life on the road, on stage, and at home with her family, while writing, recording and releasing her debut album â€œWHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?â€ 
 
The documentary is from Apple Original Films, in association with Interscope Films, Darkroom, This Machine and Lighthouse Management & Media. Directed by R.J. Cutler and starring Billie Eilish, Finneas Oâ€™Connell, Maggie Baird, and Patrick Oâ€™Connell as themselves.

previous.excerpt:
ğŸ™ğŸ¼ Thank you for making these videos possible through your support of Seek Discomfort 
âš¡ï¸ SEEK DISCOMFORT: http://seek-discomfort.com/yes-theory

This week, I traveled to the beautiful country of Iraq.  All my life I'd heard of the war in Iraq and how dangerous it was to visit, but I wanted to go there and explore if for myself to hear the stories that didn't make it into the media.  So, along with Drew Binsky, Lexie Alford and Cory Martin, we were taken around Iraqi Kurdistan by our amazing guide, Baderkhan.

âœˆ Book an Adventure: https://travel.yestheory.com/

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY
âº Yes Theory Plus: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTd7KzdwnFE3lm6LCfYDmUQ

https://www.facebook.com/groups/yesfam/

http://share.mscbd.fm/YesTheoryâ€‹

For an amazing b-roll and footage library, checkout: http://storyblocks.com/YesTheoryâ€‹

ğŸ“ˆ  Our Most Popular YouTube Videos
ğŸ¬  Traveling to the least visited country in the world: https://youtu.be/ODuEl4oNae0
ğŸ¬  Becoming Superhuman with Iceman Wim Hof: https://youtu.be/8cvhwquPqJ0
ğŸ¬  We Helicopter Bungee Jumped with Will Smith: https://youtu.be/KSu6gRp7UBA

ğŸ™ The Yes Theory Podcast: https://spoti.fi/3sFdq6v

GET IN TOUCH
ğŸŒ Our website -  http://www.yestheory.com 
ğŸŒ Advertise With Us - zack@onedayent.com 
 
Who are we? 
We believe that lifeâ€™s greatest moments and deepest connections exist outside of your comfort zone.
